thread.title: Police at the scene of serious accident near Nelson
thread.title_full: Police at the scene of serious accident near Nelson

title: Police at the scene of serious accident near Nelson
text:
Police at the scene of serious accident near Nelson Last updated 11:16, February 27 2017 FAIRFAX NZ 
People have been critically injured in an accident on the Coastal Highway. 
More than one person has been critically injured in an accident on the Coastal Highway, near Richmond in the Nelson region. 
Police are attending the crash involving two vehicles which occurred at 10.48am. 
It's understood that some passengers have critical injuries. 
Other emergency services are en route and more information will be available when the units reach the scene. 
More to follow.
